poem:
"In the Folds of Disruption"

In the corners of obscurity
three sisters wrench - crafted
tales from cobbled hearts. 
Feathers in a tempest, traded
for ink-soaked permanence, yet
Kardashians, brash and piercing,
loom in dazzling vanity - disrupting
a narrative in echo.
Who holds onto fame's capricious thread;
the exquisite ghost of Wuthering Heights,
or the fevered tenacity
of fleeting limelight?
